parties.name: NovaSec Cloud, Inc.
parties.remarks: Fictional SaaS security monitoring platform for FedRAMP Moderate demo

parties.name: GuidePoint Security
parties.remarks: Security engineering and FedRAMP readiness assessment

import-profile.remarks: FedRAMP Moderate baseline — NIST 800-53 Rev 5 (323 controls)

system-characteristics.description: Multi-tenant SaaS security monitoring platform providing centralized log aggregation, threat detection, and incident response capabilities for federal agencies.

information-types.title: Security Log Data
information-types.description: Aggregated security logs from federal agency networks

authorization-boundary.description: NovaSec Cloud operates within AWS GovCloud, using EKS for multi-tenant workload isolation, RDS for metadata, Elasticsearch for log storage, and S3 for evidence archival.

network-architecture.description: Multi-tenant EKS cluster with namespace isolation, default-deny NetworkPolicy, Istio service mesh (mTLS), and ALB Ingress with WAF.

data-flow.description: Tenant log data flows: CloudFront → ALB → Istio GW → Tenant API → Kafka → Elasticsearch. All transit encrypted via TLS/mTLS. Data at rest encrypted via KMS.

components.title: Iron Legion Security Platform
components.description: AI-powered security automation platform providing pre-deployment scanning, runtime enforcement, and compliance reporting.
components.remarks: See component-definitions/iron-legion.json for detailed control satisfaction statements.

control-implementation.description: NovaSec Cloud implements 8 priority controls via the Iron Legion platform with policy-as-code enforcement at CI, admission, and runtime layers.

implemented-requirements.description: Account Management: Tenant-scoped ServiceAccounts, automated SA token control, tenant labeling enforced by OPA/Kyverno/Gatekeeper policies.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces AC-2 via ac2_account_management.rego, enforce-tenant-isolation.yaml, K8sTenantIsolation constraint.

implemented-requirements.description: Least Privilege: Non-root containers, drop ALL capabilities, no privileged mode, no host namespaces, read-only root filesystem enforced at CI and admission.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces AC-6 via ac6_least_privilege.rego, require-least-privilege.yaml, block-privileged-containers.yaml, K8sLeastPrivilege constraint.

implemented-requirements.description: Audit Events: Falco runtime monitoring, audit sidecar injection, log format standardization, namespace audit levels enforced by policy.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces AU-2 via au2_audit_events.rego, require-audit-logging.yaml, Falco DaemonSet with custom rules.

implemented-requirements.description: Configuration Settings: Resource limits, required labels, immutable image tags, approved registries enforced at CI and admission.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces CM-6 via cm6_configuration_settings.rego, require-resource-limits.yaml.

implemented-requirements.description: Boundary Protection: Default-deny NetworkPolicy, blocked NodePort/LoadBalancer, tenant namespace isolation, hostPort restrictions.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces SC-7 via sc7_boundary_protection.rego, enforce-network-boundaries.yaml, K8sNetworkBoundaries constraint.

implemented-requirements.description: Transmission Confidentiality: TLS on all Ingress, mTLS between services via Istio, plaintext port blocking, service mesh sidecar enforcement.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces SC-8 via sc8_transmission_confidentiality.rego, require-tls-everywhere.yaml, K8sRequireTLS constraint.

implemented-requirements.description: Flaw Remediation: Pinned image tags, approved registries, Trivy scan annotations, CVE/SAST scanning in CI pipeline.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces SI-2 via si2_flaw_remediation.rego, Trivy CI scan, Semgrep SAST.

implemented-requirements.description: System Monitoring: Falco DaemonSet with custom rules, Prometheus scraping, log-collection sidecars, health probes.

by-components.description: Iron Legion enforces SI-4 via si4_system_monitoring.rego, Falco custom rules, runtime-policies.yaml alert mapping.
